desc: We supply the most heavy-duty bulletins boards for your construction project. We are the only waterproof, weatherproof, tearproof project bulletin boards. Our bulletins are made of a heavy-duty vinyl, similar to a high gauge tarp material. We then print your documents in high digital quality UV-Resistant colors.

layout.text: The Durable & Problem Free Bulletin Board
Keep Your Construction Project in Compliance With Our Weatherproof, Fade Resistant & Indestructible Bulletin Boards.
